name: Lunar Heist
description:
The "Moon Diamond" is being kept in Lunar Tower for one night only. Help this team of three climb up the tower and steal it.

Play in browser or download zip for Windows/Mac.

This game was made for Github Game Off 2020

Github link: https://github.com/octobass-games/moonshot

Art - Megan

Music and Sound Effects - Halden

Programming - Adam, Megan, and Halden
